thread.title: ‘Lionel Messi masks Barcelona disaster’ and ‘ridiculous’ — Spanish press reacts to narrow 2-1 victory over Leganes
thread.title_full: ‘Lionel Messi masks Barcelona disaster’ and ‘ridiculous’ — Spanish press reacts to narrow 2-1 victory over Leganes

author: arichardson
title: ‘Lionel Messi masks Barcelona disaster’ and ‘ridiculous’ — Spanish press reacts to narrow 2-1 victory over Leganes
text:
Comments BARCELONA may have — at least temporarily — narrowed the gap to Real Madrid down to just a point. 
However, their 2-1 win over Leganes has done nothing to ease the mounting tension around the club. Getty Images 10 Barcelona’s celebrations after late winner against Leganes smacked of pure relief 
Luis Enrique ’s men were heading for a home draw against the La Liga debutants — and could even have been behind were it not for a string of great saves by goalkeeper, Marc-Andre ter Stegen. 
However, Lionel Messi was on hand to net a 90 th -minute penalty and save the three points — and the non-celebration which followed spoke volumes. 
Spanish daily, AS , claimed the Argentine’s goal “masked a disaster” while MARCA described them as “ridiculous.” 
Even the Catalan press struggled to find many positives. 
Mundo Deportivo went with “Ufff!” which pretty much speaks for itself — while Sport which rarely hides its Barcelona biased called on everything within itself to declare: “While there’s still life, there’s hope”. .
